skill.name: Affinity Sliding
skill.description: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.
skill.effects: Enables skill use.

skill.name: Agitator
skill.description: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.
skill.effects: Attack +4 and affinity +3% while active. Attack +8 and affinity +5% while active. Attack +12 and affinity +7% while active. Attack +16 and affinity +10% while active. Attack +20 and affinity +15% while active.

skill.name: Ammo Up
skill.description: Increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)
skill.effects: Expands clip size for some ammo types. Expands clip size for many ammo types. Expands clip size for most ammo types.

skill.name: Artillery
skill.description: Strengthens explosive attacks like shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and sticky ammo.
skill.effects: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%. Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%. Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.

skill.name: Attack Boost
skill.description: Increases attack power.
skill.effects: Attack +3. Attack +6. Attack +9. Attack +5%. Bonus: +7. Attack +6%. Bonus: +8. Attack +8%. Bonus: +9. Attack +10%. Bonus: +10.

skill.name: Ballistics
skill.description: Extends the range in which ammo and arrows have maximum power.
skill.effects: Slightly extends range. Extends range. Greatly extends range.

skill.name: Bladescale Hone
skill.description: Dodge rolling to evade an attack with your weapon drawn will recover sharpness, refill bowgun ammo, or give Close-range Coatings a temporary boost.
skill.effects: Activates 50% of the time. Activates 75% of the time. Activates 100% of the time.

skill.name: Blast Attack
skill.description: Increases blast element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit).
skill.effects: Blast buildup + 5%. Bonus: +1. Blast buildup +10%. Bonus +2. Blast buildup +20%. Bonus +5.

skill.name: Blast Resistance
skill.description: Grants protection against blastblight.
skill.effects: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage. Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage. Prevents blastblight.

skill.name: Blood Rite
skill.description: A proportion of damage dealt is converted to health when striking a broken monster part.
skill.effects: Activate effect. Increases the amount of health you recover. Further increases the amount of health you recover.

skill.name: Bloodlust
skill.description: The effects of the Frenzy virus change. Health is gradually reduced, but you gain a variety of effects. Frenzy virus occurs regularly when in combat.
skill.effects: While infected, attack & evasion increase & stamina use reduced. On recover, red vitality gauge is restored, and affinity increases. While infected, further boost to effects received. Upon recovery, further increase to affinity. While infected, further boost to effects received. Upon recovery, further increases duration of increased affinity.

skill.name: Bludgeoner
skill.description: Increases attack power when your weapon sharpness is low.
skill.effects: +5% attack power when your weapon sharpness gauge is yellow or lower. +10% attack power when your weapon sharpness gauge is yellow or lower. +10% attack power when your weapon sharpness gauge is green or lower.

skill.name: Bombardier
skill.description: Increases the damage of explosive items.
skill.effects: Explosive power +10%. Explosive power +20%. Explosive power +30%.

skill.name: Botanist
skill.description: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.
skill.effects: One extra consumable herb item per gather. One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather. One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather. One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect, or mushroom item per gather.

skill.name: Bow Charge Plus
skill.description: Increases max bow charge level by one.
skill.effects: Activates skill effect.

skill.name: Bubbly Dance
skill.description: Reduces bubbleblight and grants increased evasion when afflicted.
skill.effects: Reduces the effects of major bubbleblight. Reduces major bubbleblight to minor bubbleblight and increases evasiveness while afflicted. Also inflicts bubbleblight when performing consecutive evasive movement.

skill.name: Capture Master
skill.description: High chance of increased capture rewards (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
skill.effects: Activates skill effect.

skill.name: Carving Master
skill.description: Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
skill.effects: Activates skill effect.

skill.name: Carving Pro
skill.description: Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.
skill.effects: Activates skill effect.

skill.name: Chain Crit
skill.description: Continuously landing hits gradually increases attack and elemental attack. (The amount of increase depends on the weapon.)
skill.effects: Upon attack hit, temp attack +5, element +5; hit 5 successive times for an extra stat boost. Upon attack hit, temp attack +5, element +5; hit 5 successive times for an even bigger stat boost. Upon attack hit, temp attack +5, element +5; hit 5 successive times for a huge stat boost.

skill.name: Chameleos Blessing
skill.description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Chameleos.
skill.effects: Sometimes increases the effects of Spiribirds. Also negates minor and major wind pressure. Also extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters. Also negates all wind pressure.

skill.name: Charge Master
skill.description: When a charged attack hits a monster, the element and status buildup of the charged attack increases.
skill.effects: Grants a slight increase to elemental and status buildup. Grants an increase to elemental and status buildup. Grants a large increase to elemental and status buildup.

skill.name: Coalescence
skill.description: Temporarily enhances attacks after recovering from blights or abnormal status.
skill.effects: While active, attack +12, element attack power +2, and status buildup +5%. While active, attack +15, element attack power +3, and status buildup +10%. While active, attack +18, element attack power +4, and status buildup +15%.

skill.name: Constitution
skill.description: Reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading, blocking, or doing certain other actions.
skill.effects: Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 10%. Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 20%. Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 30%. Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 40%. Reduces fixed stamina depletion by 50%.

skill.name: Counterstrike
skill.description: Temporarily increases attack power after being thrown off.
skill.effects: Attack +10 after activation. Attack +15 after activation. Attack +25 after activation.

skill.name: Critical Boost
skill.description: Increases the damage of critical hits.
skill.effects: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 30%. Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 35%. Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 40%.

skill.name: Critical Draw
skill.description: Increases affinity for a short time after performing a draw attack. (Does not include Silkbind attacks.)
skill.effects: Affinity +10%. Affinity +20%. Affinity +40%.

skill.name: Critical Element
skill.description: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.
skill.effects: Grants elemental damage +5% while active. Grants elemental damage +10% while active. Grants elemental damage +15% while active.

skill.name: Critical Eye
skill.description: Increases affinity.
skill.effects: Affinity +5%. Affinity +10%. Affinity +15%. Affinity +20%. Affinity +25%. Affinity +30%. Affinity +40%.

skill.name: Defense Boost
skill.description: Increases defense. Resistances will also improve as the level increases.
skill.effects: Defense +5. Defense +10. Defense +5%. Bonus: +10. Defense +5%. Bonus: +20. All Elemental Resistances +3. Defense +8%. Bonus: +20. All Elemental Resistances +3. Defense +8%. Bonus: +35. All Elemental Resistances +5. Defense +10%. Bonus: +35. All Elemental Resistances +5.

skill.name: Dereliction
skill.description: Qurio will drain health, but also bolster your attacks. Multiple Qurio further bolster attacks and let you recover health when performing a Switch Skill Swap.
skill.effects: Using Red Scroll: Increased elemental and status values, Using Blue Scroll: Increased attack and stun potency. Bolsters your attacks depending on which Swap Scroll is used. Further bolsters your attacks depending on which Swap Scroll is used.

skill.name: Diversion
skill.description: Increases the attention drawn when attacking a monster.
skill.effects: Activates skill effect.

skill.name: Divine Blessing
skill.description: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.
skill.effects: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%. While active, reduces damage taken by 30%. While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

skill.name: Dragon Attack
skill.description: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
skill.effects: Dragon attack +2. Dragon attack +3. Dragon attack +5%. Bonus: +4. Dragon attack +10%. Bonus: +4. Dragon attack +20%. Bonus: +4.

skill.name: Dragon Resistance
skill.description: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
skill.effects: Dragon resistance +6. Dragon resistance +12. Dragon resistance +20. Defense +10.

skill.name: Dragonheart
skill.description: Draconic energy fills you after losing a certain amount of health. Weapons lose all non-dragon effects.
skill.effects: When your health is at 50% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 30. When your health is at 50% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 50. When your health is at 70% or less, you contract dragonblight, and all elemental resistances are set to 50. Contract dragonblight when at 70% health or less. Sets Elemental resistances to 50 and gain +5% attack power. Contract dragonblight when at 80% health or less. Sets Elemental resistances to 50 and gain +10% attack power.

skill.name: Earplugs
skill.description: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.
skill.effects: Reduces the effects of weak monster roars. Nullifies weak monster roars. Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars. Nullifies weak and strong monster roars. Nullifies weak and strong monster roars. Reduces the effects of powerful monster roars.

skill.name: Evade Extender
skill.description: Increases evade distance.
skill.effects: Slightly extends evasion distance. Extends evasion distance. Greatly extends evasion distance.

skill.name: Evade Window
skill.description: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.
skill.effects: Very slightly increases invulnerability window. Slightly increases invulnerability window. Increases invulnerability window. Greatly increases invulnerability window. Massively increases invulnerability window.

skill.name: Fire Attack
skill.description: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
skill.effects: Fire attack +2. Fire attack +3. Fire attack +5%. Bonus: +4. Fire attack +10%. Bonus: +4. Fire attack +20%. Bonus: +4.

skill.name: Fire Resistance
skill.description: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
skill.effects: Fire resistance +6. Fire resistance +12. Fire resistance +20. Defense +10.

skill.name: Flinch Free
skill.description: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.
skill.effects: Prevents knockbacks. Prevents knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead. Prevents knockbacks and tripping.

skill.name: Focus
skill.description: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.
skill.effects: 5% faster gauge fill rate and 5% faster charge times. 10% faster gauge fill rate and 10% faster charge times. 20% faster gauge fill rate and 15% faster charge times.

skill.name: Foray
skill.description: Increases attack power and affinity when attacking a large monster affected by poison, paralysis, or an elemental blight.
skill.effects: While active, increases attack power +10. While active, increases attack power +10 and affinity +10%. While active, increases attack power +15 and affinity +20%.

skill.name: Fortify
skill.description: Increases your attack and defense when you fall in battle. (Disabled for some quests. Can stack twice.)
skill.effects: Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

skill.name: Free Meal
skill.description: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.
skill.effects: Activates 10% of the time. Activates 25% of the time. Activates 45% of the time.

skill.name: Furious
skill.description: Using the Red Scroll builds your fury while fighting monsters. Swapping to the Blue Scroll when your fury is full gives you infinite stamina temporarily.
skill.effects: Using Red Scroll: Defense +10, all Res +5. Swap to Blue Scroll: Temporary infinite stamina. Using Red Scroll: Defense +20, all Res +12. Swap to Blue Scroll: Temporary infinite stamina. Using Red Scroll: Defense +30, all Res +20. Swap to Blue Scroll: Temporary infinite stamina.

skill.name: Geologist
skill.description: Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.
skill.effects: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles. Allows you to gather one extra time from gathering points. Allows you to gather one extra time from mining outcrops.

skill.name: Good Luck
skill.description: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)
skill.effects: Slightly increases luck. Increases luck. Greatly increases luck.

skill.name: Grinder (S)
skill.description: When recovering sharpness, grants a boost to sharpness properties based on the number of levels recovered.
skill.effects: Effect activates for 60 seconds when sharpness recovers 3 levels. Effect activates for 60 seconds when sharpness recovers 2 levels. Effect activates for 90 seconds when sharpness recovers 2 levels.

skill.name: Guard
skill.description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.
skill.effects: Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks. Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%. Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%. Decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%. Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

skill.name: Guard Up
skill.description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.
skill.effects: Reduces damage taken by 30%. Reduces damage taken by 50%. Reduces damage taken by 80%.

skill.name: Handicraft
skill.description: Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.
skill.effects: Weapon sharpness +10. Weapon sharpness +20. Weapon sharpness +30. Weapon sharpness +40. Weapon sharpness +50.

skill.name: Hellfire Cloak
skill.description: Grants hellfire resistance and confers explosive hellfire power to your attacks.
skill.effects: Reduces damage from hellfire. Increases damage from hellfire blasts. Inflicts hellfireblight when monsters are enraged. Effect persists for one minute after a monster's rage has subsided.

skill.name: Heroics
skill.description: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.
skill.effects: While active, increases defense by 50 points. Attack +5% and defense +50 while active. Attack +5% and defense +100 while active. Attack +10% and defense +100 while active. While active, attack power +30% and defense-increasing effects are negated.

skill.name: Horn Maestro
skill.description: Increases overall performance speed and shockwave damage.
skill.effects: Activates skill effect.

skill.name: Hunger Resistance
skill.description: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.
skill.effects: Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 50%. Extends the time until your stamina cap reduces by 100%. Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

skill.name: Ice Attack
skill.description: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
skill.effects: Ice attack +2. Ice attack +3. Ice attack +5%. Bonus: +4. Ice attack +10%. Bonus: +4. Ice attack +20%. Bonus: +4.

skill.name: Ice Resistance
skill.description: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
skill.effects: Ice resistance +6. Ice resistance +12. Ice resistance +20. Defense +10.

skill.name: Item Prolonger
skill.description: Extends the duration of some item effects.
skill.effects: Item effect duration +10%. Item effect duration +25%. Item effect duration +50%.

skill.name: Jump Master
skill.description: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.
skill.effects: Negates knockback during jumps.

skill.name: Kushala Blessing
skill.description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Kushala Daora.
skill.effects: Water and ice attack +5%. Water and ice attack +10%. Also allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge. Also nullifies heat damage.

skill.name: Latent Power
skill.description: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.
skill.effects: While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%. While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%. While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%. While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%. While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

skill.name: Leap of Faith
skill.description: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monster, and extends the dive-evade distance.
skill.effects: Enables skill use.

skill.name: Load Shells
skill.description: Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.
skill.effects: Increases ammo and coating reloading speed. Gunlance loading capacity +1. Increases charge blade phials.

skill.name: Mail of Hellfire
skill.description: Decreases defense but increases attack. Exact changes to stats depends on Switch Skill Swap Scroll that is being used.
skill.effects: Using Red Scroll: Defense down, attack up. Using Blue Scroll: Resistance down, element up. Further decreases defense and resistance, while further increasing attack and element. Greatly decreases defense and resistance, while greatly increasing attack and element.

skill.name: Marathon Runner
skill.description: Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).
skill.effects: Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 15%. Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 30%. Reduces continuous stamina depletion by 50%.

skill.name: Master Mounter
skill.description: Improves your Wyvern Riding skills.
skill.effects: Makes filling the Riding Gauge easier and increases ease of parrying.

skill.name: Master's Touch
skill.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.
skill.effects: Grants a 20% chance of no sharpness loss while active. Grants a 40% chance of no sharpness loss while active. Grants a 80% chance of no sharpness loss while active.

skill.name: Maximum Might
skill.description: Increases affinity if stamina is kept full for a period of time.
skill.effects: While active, increases affinity by 10%. While active, increases affinity by 20%. While active, increases affinity by 30%.

skill.name: Mind's Eye
skill.description: Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets.
skill.effects: +10% damage to hard targets and a 50% reduction to your attacks being deflected. +15% damage to hard targets and a 100% reduction to your attacks being deflected. +30% damage to hard targets and a 100% reduction to your attacks being deflected.

skill.name: Muck Resistance
skill.description: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck or deep snow.
skill.effects: Reduces limits on movement speed. Negates limits to movement speed.

skill.name: Mushroomancer
skill.description: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.
skill.effects: Lets you digets blue mushrooms and toadstools. Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms. Additionally lets you digest mandragoras and exciteshrooms.

skill.name: Normal/Rapid Up
skill.description: Increases the attack power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.
skill.effects: Slightly increases the power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows. Increases the power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows. Greatly increases the power of Normal Ammo and Rapid-type arrows.

skill.name: Offensive Guard
skill.description: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard.
skill.effects: Attack +5% when active. Attack +10% when active. Attack +15% when active.

skill.name: Paralysis Attack
skill.description: Increases paralysis element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
skill.effects: Paralysis buildup +5%. Bonus: +1. Paralysis buildup +10%. Bonus: +2. Paralysis buildup +20%. Bonus: +5.

skill.name: Paralysis Resistance
skill.description: Reduces the duration of paralysis.
skill.effects: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%. Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%. Prevents paralysis.

skill.name: Partbreaker
skill.description: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of large monsters.
skill.effects: Part damage +10%. Part damage +20%. Part damage +30%.

skill.name: Peak Performance
skill.description: Increases attack when your health is full.
skill.effects: Attack +5 while active. Attack +10 while active. Attack +20 while active.

skill.name: Pierce Up
skill.description: Increases the attack power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.
skill.effects: Slightly increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows. Increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows. Greatly increases the power of Piercing Ammo and Piercing-type arrows.

skill.name: Poison Attack
skill.description: Increases poison element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
skill.effects: Poison buildup +5%. Bonus: +1. Poison buildup +10%. Bonus: +2. Poison buildup +20%. Bonus: +5.

skill.name: Poison Resistance
skill.description: Reduces damage while poisoned.
skill.effects: Reduces the number of times you take poison damage. Greatly reduces the number of times you take poison damage. Prevents poison and reduces venom.

skill.name: Power Prolonger
skill.description: Long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades stay powered up longer.
skill.effects: Slightly boosts the duration weapons are powered up. Boosts the duration weapons are powered up. Greatly boosts the duration weapons are powered up.

skill.name: Protective Polish
skill.description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.
skill.effects: Effect lasts 30 seconds. Effect lasts 60 seconds. Effect lasts 90 seconds.

skill.name: Punishing Draw
skill.description: Adds a stun effect to draw atacks and slightly increases attack power.
skill.effects: Applies a minor chance to stun. Attack power of draw attacks +3. Applies a chance to stun. Attack power of draw attacks +5. Applies a great chance to stun. Attack power of draw attacks +7.

skill.name: Quick Breath
skill.description: You can remove some statuses or slow their effects by performing a Switch Skill Swap. Health recovers when a status is removed.
skill.effects: Activate effect.

skill.name: Quick Sheath
skill.description: Speeds up weapon sheathing.
skill.effects: Slightly increases sheathing speed. Moderately increases sheathing speed. Greatly increases sheathing speed.

skill.name: Rapid Fire Up
skill.description: Improves light bowgun rapid fire.
skill.effects: Rapid fire damage +5%. Rapid fire damage +10%. Rapid fire damage +20%.

skill.name: Rapid Morph
skill.description: Increases switch speed and power for switch axes and charge blades.
skill.effects: Speed +10%. Speed +20%. Morph attack damage +10%. Speed +30%. Morph attack damage +20%.

skill.name: Razor Sharp
skill.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness.
skill.effects: Activates 10% of the time. Activates 25% of the time. Activates 50% of the time.

skill.name: Recoil Down
skill.description: Reduces recoil when firing bowgun ammo.
skill.effects: Recoil -1. Recoil -2. Recoil -3.

skill.name: Recovery Speed
skill.description: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).
skill.effects: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage. Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage. Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

skill.name: Recovery Up
skill.description: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.
skill.effects: Slightly increases recovery. Increases recovery. Greatly increases recovery.

skill.name: Redirection
skill.description: Perform a perfectly-timed Switch Skill Swap just as a monster attacks to reduce the damage and negate damage reactions.
skill.effects: Activate effect. Nullifies incoming damage, and automatically performs a Swap Evade backwards which recovers Wirebug Gauge.

skill.name: Reload Speed
skill.description: Increases bowgun reloading and bow coating loading speed.
skill.effects: Bowgun speed +1. Improves bow handling. Bowgun speed +2.Loads bow coating automatically. Bowgun speed +3.

skill.name: Resentment
skill.description: Increases your attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).
skill.effects: Attack +5 while active. Attack +10 while active. Attack +15 while active. Attack +20 while active. Attack +25 while active.

skill.name: Resuscitate
skill.description: Increases attack power when you are suffering from an abnormal status.
skill.effects: Attack +5 while active. Attack +10 while active. Attack +20 while active.

skill.name: Spiribird's Call
skill.description: Receive the effects of a random Spiribird at fixed intervals. (Certain quests only)
skill.effects: Activate effect.

skill.name: Sleep Attack
skill.description: Increases sleep element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
skill.effects: Sleep buildup +5%. Bonus: +1. Sleep buildup +10%. Bonus: +2. Sleep buildup +20%. Bonus: +5.

skill.name: Sleep Resistance
skill.description: Reduces the duration of sleep.
skill.effects: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%. Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%. Prevents sleep.

skill.name: Slugger
skill.description: Makes it easier to stun monsters.
skill.effects: Stun power +20%. Stun power +30%. Stun power +40%.

skill.name: Spare Shot
skill.description: Bow and bowgun shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.
skill.effects: Activates 3% of the time. Activates 10% of the time. Activates 20% of the time.

skill.name: Special Ammo Boost
skill.description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.
skill.effects: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%. Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

skill.name: Speed Eating
skill.description: Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.
skill.effects: Slightly increases eating speed. Increases eating speed. Greatly increases eating speed.

skill.name: Speed Sharpening
skill.description: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.
skill.effects: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process. Removes two cycles from the sharpening process. Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

skill.name: Spread Up
skill.description: Increases the attack power of Spread Ammon and Spread-type arrows.
skill.effects: Slightly increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows. Increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows. Greatly increases the power of Spread Ammo, Shrapnel Ammo, and Spread-type arrows.

skill.name: Stamina Surge
skill.description: Speeds up stamina recovery.
skill.effects: Stamina recovery speed +10%. Stamina recovery speed +20%. Stamina recovery speed +40%.

skill.name: Stamina Thief
skill.description: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.
skill.effects: Exhaust power +20%. Exhaust power +30%. Exhaust power +40%.

skill.name: Steadiness
skill.description: Supresses the deviation of bowgun shots.
skill.effects: Deviation -1. Deviation -2.

skill.name: Stormsoul
skill.description: Strengthens thunder and dragon power and improves skills of the same elements.
skill.effects: Thunder and dragon attack +5%. Thunder and dragon attack +10%. Thunder and dragon attack +15%. Also increases level of other skills by +1. Also increases level of other skills by +1 (stacks with previous bonus).

skill.name: Stun Resistance
skill.description: Reduces stun duration.
skill.effects: Reduces the duration of stun by 60%. Reduces the duration of stun by 90%. Prevents stun.

skill.name: Teostra Blessing
skill.description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Teostra.
skill.effects: Fire attack and blast buildup +5%. Fire attack and blast buildup +10%. Also prevents poison and venom. Also negates theft.

skill.name: Thunder Alignment
skill.description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Thunder Serpent Narwa.
skill.effects: Thunder resistance +1. Thunder resistance +2. Thunder resistance +3. Thunder resistance +4. Also grants the effect Fortunate.

skill.name: Thunder Attack
skill.description: Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
skill.effects: Thunder attack +2. Thunder attack +3. Thunder attack +5%. Bonus: +4. Thunder attack +10%. Bonus: +4. Thunder attack +20%. Bonus: +4.

skill.name: Thunder Resistance
skill.description: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
skill.effects: Thunder resistance +6. Thunder resistance +12. Thunder resistance +20. Defense +10.

skill.name: Tremor Resistance
skill.description: Grants protection against ground tremors.
skill.effects: Nullifies minor ground tremors. Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors. Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

skill.name: Tune-Up
skill.description: Increases the stats of custom mods attached to bowguns.
skill.effects: Increases stats of Silencer and Shield. If neither are equpped, Reload Speed +1. Also increases stats of Long Barrel and Power Barrel. If neither are equipped, Reload Speed + 1 and Steadiness +1.

skill.name: Wall Runner
skill.description: Reduces stamina consumption when running on walls.
skill.effects: Reduces stamina consumption by 25% while wall running. Reduces stamina consumption by 50% while wall running. Also temporarily increases attack power by wall running.

skill.name: Wall Runner (Boost)
skill.description: Wirebug Gauge recovers faster while wall running.
skill.effects: Activate effect.

skill.name: Water Attack
skill.description: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
skill.effects: Water attack +2. Water attack +3. Water attack +5%. Bonus: +4. Water attack +10%. Bonus: +4. Water attack +20%. Bonus: +4.

skill.name: Water Resistance
skill.description: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
skill.effects: Water resistance +6. Water resistance +12. Water resistance +20. Defense +10.

skill.name: Weakness Exploit
skill.description: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.
skill.effects: Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity. Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity. Attacks that hit weak spots have 50% increased affinity.

skill.name: Wide Range
skill.description: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.
skill.effects: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy. Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy. Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius at 66% of their efficacy. Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy. Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with full efficacy.

skill.name: Wind Alignment
skill.description: Gain the power of the elder dragon Wind Serpent Ibushi.
skill.effects: Dragon resistance +1. Dragon resistance +2. Dragon resistance +3. Dragon resistance +4. Also grants the effect Fortunate.

skill.name: Windproof
skill.description: Grants protection against wind pressure.
skill.effects: Negates minor wind pressure. Negates minor and major wind pressure. Negates minor and major wind pressure and reduces the effects of dragon wind pressure.

skill.name: Wirebug Whisperer
skill.description: Improves your handling of Wirebugs.
skill.effects: Extends the duration you can keep a Wirebug by 30%. Also increases Wirefall recovery rate. Also increases passive recovery rate while on the ground.
